title: USA Rules Paris-Nice: McNulty Roars Back into GC Lead, Jorgenson Second after Sensational Alpine Stage
content:
McNulty and Jorgenson go 1-2 on GC to leave race poised for wild weekend finale.

Read the full article at USA Rules Paris-Nice: McNulty Roars Back into GC Lead, Jorgenson Second after Sensational Alpine Stage on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
